description: Housed in the picturesque medieval castle of Spilimbergo, this restaurant boasts a splendid façade adorned with 14C frescoes, plus two rustic yet elegant dining rooms. If you’re looking for somewhere for a romantic dinner and modern cuisine, then this is the place for you!
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
